title: Research Work
subtitle: Academic Research and Publications
disambiguation: This article covers the research work of [Aneesh Kumar](/). For his industry experience, see [Aneesh Kumar (Industry Work)](/industry-work).

sections.title: Predicting Emergent Capabilities Using Sparse Features

content.text: Research on understanding and predicting emergent capabilities in machine learning models through sparse feature analysis and interpretability techniques.
Comprehensive analysis of biological timescale synaptic plasticity mechanisms and their implications for neural computation and learning.
